page.title: 06RIDING STABLES
page.content: There are 3 horse riding stables in Forton.They are called Dunromin, Foxholes and Bayhorse stables. {Dunromin}stable is on Hollins Lane and has been there for 6 years.It has 1 paddock, 2 barns and 10 boxes and 19 horses.These horses include crossbreeds, thoroughbreds, palamino and 1 hackney.One person works there full time and 7 teenage girls work there at the weekend and in the evenings. The stable has 18 acres. {Lessons}There is jumping,hacks and lessons inside or outside.It costs Â£2.00 for half an hour and Â£2.50 for an hour.Saturday is the busiest day.
